entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
